My Creative Process

Here you can get an idea on how your project will be developed

1

Discuss The Project

Identifying and understanding what exactly you want helps in providing the perfect solution you are looking for. Through questions and further clarification, I can serve you better.

2

Planning

Varied other major decisions such as formulating the sitemap, wireframing, planning the layout, UI/UX, selecting the right technology stack, etc. are made at this stage.

3

Development

Completing all the features we discussed before and build a responsive, and mobile friendly application.

4

Testing and Deployment

In this process, we go through several meticulous tests to ensure that there are no bugs or issues. Once we show the green flag for the web app, the application is deployed to the server.
